title: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Yuri
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Transmigration   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 赤色陷阱
description: Yvonne really doesn’t understand. She’s already in the exile ending, so why is Elsa, the heroine, still getting involved with a villainess like herself?! The villainess who refuses to bully others and the heroine who wants to be bullied by her. This is the story of two girls with vastly differing personalities! >
